name: Adra - AI-Data-Robotics-Association
focus: AI, Data, Robotics, advocacy, collaboration, driving research and innovation in Europe
description: The European association for Artificial Intelligence, Data, and Robotics, bringing together the community to advance the development, adoption, and ethical use of these technologies in Europe.

name: AI Sweden
focus: Applied Artificial Intelligence, accelerating AI adoption and innovation across Sweden, building a national AI ecosystem
description: A national center for applied AI, bringing together academia, industry, and the public sector to strengthen Sweden's competitiveness in AI.

name: AppliedAI Initiative GmbH
focus: Applied Artificial Intelligence, enabling companies to adopt and scale AI, AI education
description: Europe's largest initiative for the application of AI in industry, providing guidance, training, and platforms for AI implementation.
research_areas: AI Use Cases in various industries

name: Barcelona Supercomputing Center
focus: High-performance computing (HPC), computational science, supercomputing infrastructure, Artificial Intelligence
description: A public research center that manages MareNostrum, one of the most powerful supercomputers in Europe, dedicated to advancing computational science and engineering.
research_areas: Computer Sciences (HPC, Big Data, AI, Computer Architecture)
Computer Applications in Science and Engineering

name: CSCS (Swiss National Supercomputing Centre)
focus: High-performance computing, computational science, supercomputing
description: The national high-performance computing centre of Switzerland, providing state-of-the-art supercomputing facilities and services for scientific research.

name: CWI - Centrum Wiskunde & Informatica
focus: Mathematics & Computer Science
description: The national research institute for mathematics and computer science in the Netherlands, known for pioneering research in fundamental areas like algorithms, data, security, and quantum computing, and for contributing to various fields, including the creation of the Python programming language. [4, 5, 9, 10, 16, 23, 32, 34]

name: DeepMind London
focus: General AI Research
description: A world leader in artificial intelligence research, developing general-purpose learning algorithms and working on breakthroughs across various scientific and real-world challenges. [13, 14, 19, 24, 27, 37, 43]

name: DFKI - German Research Center for Artificial Intelligence
focus: AI Research & Development
description: Leading European AI research center focusing on innovative software technologies based on Artificial Intelligence methods, with an emphasis on both scientific excellence and societal relevance. [7, 18, 25, 26, 31]

name: ELLIS - European Laboratory for Learning and Intelligent Systems
focus: Fundamental science in machine learning and AI, technical innovation, societal impact, education, securing Europe's sovereignty in AI
description: A pan-European AI network of excellence, founded in 2018, that aims to secure Europe's future in AI by performing high-level research and fostering talent. [8, 45, 46]

name: EPFL AI
focus: Science, Technology, Engineering, Life Sciences, Artificial Intelligence
description: A leading European university of science and technology in Lausanne, Switzerland, known for its excellence in research and education and hosting the EPFL AI Center and an ELLIS unit. [8, 15, 44]

name: ETH AI Center
focus: Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics, Data Science, Sustainability, Manufacturing Technologies, Robotics
description: A public university in Zurich, Switzerland, founded in 1854, consistently ranked among the world's leading universities in science and technology. [3, 17, 29, 35, 36]

name: ETH Zurich - Institute for Machine Learning
focus: Machine Learning Research
description: A key institute within ETH Zurich, dedicated to cutting-edge research in machine learning, focusing on learning and inference of large statistical models from data, with applications across science and engineering. [6, 28, 39, 40]

name: Forschungszentrum Jülich AI
focus: Energy, Information, Bioeconomy, Quantum Technologies, High-Performance Computing, Artificial Intelligence
description: One of Europe's largest interdisciplinary research institutions, a member of the Helmholtz Association, contributing to solutions for major societal challenges. [2, 12, 13, 16, 18, 22, 37]

name: IBM AI
focus: Artificial Intelligence, Cloud Computing, Quantum Computing, Enterprise Technology, Consulting, IT Services
description: A multinational technology and consulting company, a major player in computing hardware, software, and services.

name: IDEAS NCBR
focus: Artificial intelligence, digital economy, AI research, bridging academia and business
description: A research center based in Warsaw, Poland, created with the goal of becoming a leading innovation center in AI and the digital economy, and hosts the ELLIS Unit Warsaw. [10, 26]
research_areas: Intelligent Algorithms and Learned Data Structures
Efficient and Sustainable Machine Learning Focused on Computer Vision
Autonomous Agents and Alignment of Language Models

name: INRIA - French National Institute for Research in Digital Science
focus: Digital Sciences
description: Premier research institute in computational sciences, pioneering advances in AI and machine learning across its various research centers in France. [3]

name: Instituto Superior Técnico
focus: Engineering, Science, Technology, Architecture
description: The largest school of engineering, science, and technology in Portugal, offering a wide range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs and conducting research. [45]

name: International Computation and AI Network (ICAIN)
focus: International collaboration in computation and AI, fostering research, education, and policy dialogue
description: An international network promoting collaboration among researchers, institutions, and policymakers to advance computation and AI for global benefit.

name: KTH Royal Institute of Technology
focus: Technology Research
description: A leading technical university in Northern Europe, known for strong research and education in technology, with significant contributions in AI, robotics, and intelligent systems. [15, 33, 36, 41]

name: Kyutai
focus: Fundamental Artificial Intelligence research, open and independent AI development, large AI models
description: A newly established independent, non-profit AI research laboratory in France, focused on pushing the boundaries of open scientific research in AI.

name: LAION
focus: Large-scale AI research, open AI models, open datasets for training large machine learning models, open science
description: A non-profit organization that curates and releases large, open datasets for AI training, most notably for large language and image models, promoting open research.

name: Linköping University AI
focus: Interdisciplinary research, materials science, IT, hearing, bioelectronics, mobile communication
description: A Swedish university known for its interdisciplinary approach and innovation in education and research, with world-leading research in several areas. [6, 31, 38, 41]

name: Technical University of Munich - AI Lab
focus: Applied AI Research
description: A top technical university with extensive research in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and their applications across various engineering and scientific disciplines. AI research is conducted across numerous chairs and initiatives within the university.

name: Tübingen AI Center
focus: Artificial intelligence, machine learning, fundamental AI research, transfer to applications
description: A central institution for AI research in Tübingen, part of the 'Cyber Valley' ecosystem, bringing together leading AI scientists. [46]

name: University of Cambridge - AI @ Cam
focus: Artificial Intelligence, Computer Science, Technology, and related academic disciplines
description: A world-renowned university with significant research in artificial intelligence, computer science, and related fields, conducted across various departments and centers like the Department of Computer Science and Technology. [8, 11, 29, 30]
